website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you prefer solid colors in a shag carpet style.
pros: Thick fibers and classic shag style easily match room decor
Available in several sizes and colors, from neutral to vibrant
cons: Some of the colors look different in person, and it takes a while for the edges to stay flat
Slight chemical smell gradually wears off over time

customer_reviews.title: Nice rug and looks great! Doesn' shed!
customer_reviews.text: Love the rug! It looks great in my living room. I have spent a few months looking for a shaggy rug with free shipping. It has a newish smell but I'm guessing that will go away with time. Thank you! Btw...no shedding
customer_reviews.author: Sullystein

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Just took it out of the package. It doesn't have a weird smell which is nice. I love love the color. It's a little to big for my studio ( I ordered 6'7 x 9'3) but it's worth it! Looks super fancy and feels amazing
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Cozy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love this rug! I got an 8x10 and it feels like we have a carpeted living room. (We have hard wood floors and tile through the whole house.) My husband loves it he won't even sit on the couches he just lays on the rug. I got a rug pad but you don't even need it really for a rug this size with couches sitting on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W.

customer_reviews.title: You'll love this rug!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as ordered, but better than expected. Ordered 5x7 in Cream. Perfect size! It was delivered in less than 24 hours and the pics were taken within 2 hours of delivery. Unrolled and slightly weighted the very end to help lie flat. Hand fluffed the fibers as they were crushed during shipping, but sprang to life and were unexpectedly soft. Would definitely recommend and definitely reorder for other spaces! To note, cream is darker than off-white, but not "yellow" at all. Also, did not experience any shedding.
customer_reviews.author: crystal_clear00

customer_reviews.title: TEAL rig isnt really TEAL
customer_reviews.text: comfy rug but BEWARE!! the TEAL colored rug isnt even Teal its more of a gray color, i guess ill take it tho not bad for the price *below is a picture of me and my "TEAL" rug i was not impressed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This rug is amazing! so soft and super easy to vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This rug is amazing!so soft and super easy to vacuum!it's pretty think too.i ordered 5x7 beige and liked it so much that I ordered 2 runner rugs to match for the kitchen and laundry room
customer_reviews.author: Stiliyana Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great looking rug at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this! The rug looks great, feels great, and actually appears more expensive than I thought it would. I would buy this again. The attached photo is immediately after unrolling, so i expect it to flatten out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: seanp7

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous design/shipping flaw
customer_reviews.text: The rug itself is pretty much as pictured, except for the curve defect in it that makes it impossible for children to walk without effort, for adults to vacuum without picking up the vacuum over the hump, infants to walk over without tripping, etc. We've tried everything from flattening with a couch to books to stretching it over a bannister to try and get rid of the ridge that pops up almost in the middle of the carpet and goes the entire length, but it always returns. Waste of money and dangerous, it sits in the garage now.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT a 2" plush shag rug. The ...
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a 2" plush shag rug. The advertised measurements are incorrect. The rug is 1.5" tall measured from the woven base. I bought this based on the mere fact that it was advertised as a 2" tall rug. This is not the case. I cannot ship this back because its size otherwise I would. The description and advertised size should be corrected its not right to deceive customers.
customer_reviews.author: Savirc

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price. Beige has pink undertone
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy with my purchase. The quality of the rug is good for the cheaper price. My two dogs love it and can’t stop rolling/playing/sleeping on it. The rug did have some smell to it but I rolled it out outside (left it for a few hours) and fluffed it with a wide bristle hair brush. It has since dissipated in about one day. My only disappointment is that the Beige color has a lot of peach pink undertones than I was expecting, I should have went with gray. Totally doesn’t match my living room but I can make it work. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Sum

customer_reviews.title: Carpet had other colors woven in
customer_reviews.text: This rug is great except it has patches of teal and orange woven in throughout the carpet. Not happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Brett Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Really Rough, But Seems Well-Made
customer_reviews.text: The rug looks nice-it seems sturdy and has a decent shag look. My concern is that it's ROUGH. Really rough. It feels like really cheap carpet. I had purchased a rug for about $75 from Target before purchasing this rug-it was very similar, but it was SO soft, but it was too small (at 5x7) and didn't come in a larger size. After reading the reviews and description of this rug, I decided to give it a try for the money. I wish I hadn't. The size of this makes it a pain to return so I'm kind of stuck with it, now.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Payne

customer_reviews.title: Wrong on so many levels!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this no stars I would. I ordered a RED rug for my business. Upon setting my makeup studio. I pull the rug out of it's box and it is a bright orange! Who is working in this department? They are clearly colorblind! I am so mad I didn't bother taking pictures and this is definitely too much hassle to send back! I definitely need to be compensated or given a red rug! So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C.

customer_reviews.title: Some truth...
customer_reviews.text: The dimensions of 3.3 feet is correct but the 5 ft dimension falls a bit short. The quality is a 3.6/5 comfy. I will keep the rug because it's not bad honestly but be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Nard S.

customer_reviews.title: Size is not accurate, edges curl and it slides all over.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 20” x 59”, and you can see by the measurements that it’s actually 24” wide, and it’s 58” long. Also, the edges curl up a lot, making it a trip hazard. I tried to tape down the edges but they don’t stay. If you don’t put rubber padding underneath, you’ll be sliding all over. The fabric was already starting to come out, there were quite a few loose pieces in the bag. So between sliding, curling, cheap shag and the wrong size, I’ll be returning this. The color is very nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Gmahle

customer_reviews.title: Smells Terrible, Feels Greasy. Not Soft at all.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what happened hear but after receiving this order I dug through reviews and found 1 other person that had a near identical experience as me. The whole rug smells and feels like it was covered in machine oil or grease. The entire house stinks after bringing it in and opening it. Not an easy product to return given its size and that the shipping material is not reusable. No matter how cheap a rug is, this isn't the rug you want in your house. Smells like I'm in a chemical factory. Guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Jason K.

customer_reviews.title: Reviews are true: very affordable soft cushiony carpet style rug
customer_reviews.text: The reviews are true, its very comfy and cushiony. For this price it cant be beat (i can guarantee this as a bargain hunting shopper). The jute woven backing is very thick and cushiony. But its polyurethane on the front so it dries easily. My dog peed on it and i just hosed it off deeply and left it outside to dry for a couple days and it was good as new. The rug is heavy. The ends dont fold up, just press them folded in the opposite direction and then it lays flat like the pic. No shedding at all and solid construction. Definitely a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Listen2God

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: My excitement to receive my rug as promised quickly changed to frustration. The rug came sewn incorrectly, leaving the loop siding disconnected from the rug. I sewed it on. The rug also has problems with not laying flat and causing a tripping hazard. The corners are great and lay perfectly. Sadly, the long sides buckle and arch upward. I have tried turning the carpet and placing the coffee table on the opposite side. The newly exposed area buckled immediately once walked on. It is a beautiful area rug and extremely plush and soft. It's to bad it came with problems.
customer_reviews.author: Lori M.

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this rug
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this beautiful 8 x 10' rug. My husband was skeptical about a shag rug with 3 little dogs and Mom's wheelchair but we've had it for a couple months and couldn't be happier with it. It came rolled up and wrapped well, after unrolled by the next day it totally laid flat. It doesn't shed and the turquoise color is outstanding, and it is very soft. It cleans and vacuums easily. Can't find Anything wrong with this rug!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Burning chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: I laid the carpet out on hardwood floor, clean floor. By two hours after putting it in the room there is a strong chemical smell. We actually searched our home for something heating up or burning. I will give it a few days to see it the odor goes away. Looks great, but can't even sleep in the bedroom with the rug.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great quality
customer_reviews.text: This rug was much more than I was expecting. It seems to be very well made and the pile is high and very comfortable and soft on the feet. The color also goes very well with the rest of the room. It stays firmly in place, the underside makes it very resistant to movement. The only negative is that I purchased it for my daughter to crawl around on, and it has a pretty strong chemical smell. Hopefully that fades on its own, but it's a small con for this considering the quality and great price. I will be purchasing another in the future for a different room.
customer_reviews.author: TheSubtleLife

customer_reviews.title: I would give it another 2-3 stars if it didn't smell like machine oil
customer_reviews.text: 201701 Arrived today. I would give it another 2-3 stars if it didn't smell like machine oil. I assume I got the batch recently after a maintenance of their equipment. The entire room smells of oil. Otherwise it is soft and nice
customer_reviews.author: Samie

customer_reviews.title: There is a chemical on the rug that gets on your skin
customer_reviews.text: The rug took about 2 weeks to arrive. I got the brown one. I unrolled the rug and laid it out and it took a while for me to be okay with it.. However. When you touch the rug it leaves something on your skin. I tried vacuuming it twice. I think I'm going to have to run the carpet cleaner over it. I don't know what's on it but I don't want to poison my family.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Charcoal should not be green
customer_reviews.text: Charcoal is more green...my wife and I bought this Charcoal rug to accompany the new grey couch we recently purchased. We unrolled and automatically saw the green in it...it's not a dark grey as pictured at all. We even vacuumed it to try and pick it up a bit and see if the rug might show better that way...nope. Not happy with the rug, 2 stars because it is soft and if the color worked and came as pictured, this review would be very different.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Torquoise Carpet
customer_reviews.text: I love this carpet it's amazing quality no shedding ..and true to its color . I oredered a 5x7 I wanted a larger one for the room I wanted it in so ill probably be ordering another one .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it, cozy and nice color
customer_reviews.text: I was so worried about ordering a affordable rug online. So happy with this rug, it's exactly what I was looking for and the grey looks great with our new dark floors! Thanks for a quality product!
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: A good rug for the price
customer_reviews.text: I read countless reviews and this rug seemed to be the best bet for me and my budget. I got the 5'3" x 7" and it is a good size for my room, however, it is not as soft as many claimed. It is comfortable under your feet and looks quite nice, but it is not so soft you'd be willing to sleep on it. For $57 I am very pleased and fits the space quite well, but it is not the winning any awards for its plush/softness. With that being said, if you are looking for a comfortable rug that polishes off the look of your room for a great price, you have come to the right place.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Davey

customer_reviews.title: sooooooooo happy!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness, I was so afraid that I would be disappointed because most of the reviews were good but I read one that stated that they wanted red but got maroon, and I was like who wants to go through the trouble with retuning a rug? Oh my goodness when it came today and I saw that it was red I got happy right away then I couldn't wait,I had to put it down. If you could see my face you would know just how happy and pleased I am. It looks wonderful this product is great can't wait for my family to see it. My living room looks fantastic! I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rosetta Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Well made, super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: After looking at Home Depot for a rug that looked decent but would be within my budget, I left empty handed. :( So I looked through Amazon, and after finding many rugs and reading different reviews, I took a shot with this one and got it for my living room. Couldn't be happier. It arrived well packed and the quality is impressive. Very soft—feels more expensive than what I paid for it (and way better than any of the rugs at Home Depot that cost more but felt like sandpaper). Very pleased with my purchase! The beige color matches perfectly with my home: the color in the product picture was spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY = LOVELY COLOR = LOVELY RUG
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous color and nice rug for the price. It is a deeper turquoise than I had hoped for. I would say the rug is a deeper turquoise color than pictured. The rug fluffed up immediately with the vacuum cleaner. It smelled a bit for the first two days and now I don't smell anything. Even then it wasn't a bad order. I ordered the 8x10 and the 7x9 not knowing which one would best fit. The 8x10 definitely worked better and I returned the 7x9 rug to amazon *at a whopping cost of $25.00). It's a good thing they were both reasonably priced. I have been looking at similar rugs for twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: empi

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate, this is a great rug!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even want rugs, but the cat has been vomiting and it's for protection of the carpet. I bought the cheapest largest runner off Amazon for my bedroom, and it's FANTASTIC! What a difference, stepping out of bed onto this plush rug. Feels so great and soft. I've been sitting/laying on it to exercise as well. Easy to vaccum, but shake it out first, especially if there are litter or crumbs about. It's protected the carpet so far, and cleans up easily with a regular spot spray and some paper towels. No loss of pile. I'm surprisingly pleased with this rug, happy I purchased it, and such a great deal too!
customer_reviews.author: Wolfyone

customer_reviews.title: The Red is pretty bright.
customer_reviews.text: When the dogs trashed our original rug we needed an inexpensive replacement. The feel and quality of this rug are just as nice as the original - but the "burgundy" color is more like "true red" - fortunately, that works well in our space. Happy with this purchase which had been opened and was discounted, but it arrived in perfect RED condition (I suspect the first buyer just couldn't handle the color because there was nothing wrong with the actual rug.) Happy here.
customer_reviews.author: Classic_Mom_Md

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This shag rug is really nice. I saw some bad comments and I'm glad I ignored them. The color is nice and I am able to vacuum it without any problems. Goes well with dark browns. Just don't allow the kids to play with these new tiny toys because they get lost in the shag and finding them with your feet is no fun!
customer_reviews.author: Leo R.

customer_reviews.title: WOW QUALITY IS AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 7'10" x 9'10", Charcoal Gray for my 10x12 small music studio and am completely blown away. The carpet was surprisingly HEAVY and when I unrolled it laid perfectly flat after a quick vacuum. It's incredibly thick/plush and very soft with absolutely no shedding or smell at all. This carpet in my opinion was a complete amazon score! I'm normally not one to leave reviews but this truly deserved one and I cannot believe this carpet was just $150, it feels like a $500 + carpet as it is the exact quality I would expect from a high end store. I'm not 100% sure if I just got super lucky but I am so happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate to buy a rug online when it is this one!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase yet another rug online....I've been burned in the past. However this bad boy met and exceeded my expectations. Great quality for the price. A nice durable soft rug. Using in my one year old daughter's room and she and her four legged fur brother love to romp around on it. Mid length shag, easy to vacuum. Purchased the "cream" color and it is a nice neutral tone, not too bright, not too yellowy. You will not find a rug of this quality for such a low price elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Fabian

customer_reviews.title: Super plush and backing is strong!
customer_reviews.text: I got the hallway runner in beige to try and muffle some of the sound traveling downstairs from my kids' running around. It is super plush and does the job well! I love that it's wider than most hallway rugs so it covers the entire hall. I wish it came in a size large enough to cover my living room! Sometimes, with shag, the rug can flatten over time and look a bit rough in well traveled areas so I will come back to update in a few months!
customer_reviews.author: SnotFace

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the Money but it’s the wrong Shade.
customer_reviews.text: Very long shag, easily lays flat after unwrapping and doesn’t really have that “carpet smell” BUT it’s not Navy Blue it’s more of a Dark Royal, and if you’re a navy lover or trying to match something you’ll see the difference right away.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Trax

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL rug, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: BEAUTIFUL rug, especially for the price!!!! Very very happy with this purchase - very plush. I put carpet pad underneath and it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Second purchase didn’t go well
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. This is my second time purchasing all colors not made equal. My first rug was the cream one it came great. Just got the grey one for our bedroom is stinks sooo bad I don’t know if it’s from a different warehouse or what but it’s thinner not as shaggy and reals!!
customer_reviews.author: APOTEET

customer_reviews.title: This rug is awesome. No shedding, and highly pet-by-product resistant
customer_reviews.text: This rug is awesome. No shedding, easy to vacuum, and the pile never mats down. It always looks perfect. Thanks, Sweet Home. UPDATE: After ten months with a cat and a dog, this rug still looks new. Still no shedding, and it vacuums beautifully. Last week my dog experienced a bowel upset while i was at work, leaving the evidence on this rug. The pile density prevented the mess from reaching the backing. Although it had obviously been there a while, I was able to clean it completely leaving no stain and no odor. If I could give this more than 5 stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Know what you're getting with shag
customer_reviews.text: As we are long-term, non-complaining renters, we prefer to cover worn areas in carpeting rather than demanding a complete replacement. As such, this rug had a specific desired function when we bought it, and it has ably filled that role. Being shag, it is a challenge to thoroughly vacuum all little bits from within the fibers, and it is impressive to observe the seemingly endless rain of crumbs when shaking the rug outside. That said, this comes with the territory when purchasing shag rugs, and I have no complaints whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Pike

customer_reviews.title: Best rug everrrr
customer_reviews.text: This is my second rug from this company and I LOVE IT. I bought the first one about almost 4 years ago, it was a 5x7 charcol grey, i loved it so much and the color was amazing. This time i ordered a 5x7 normal grey. They quality is there! Its so soft and so easy to clean. The only negative thing i have to say about this is that the cut is uneven. Its was very noticable in the first rug, in this second rug it's not as noticable but its still not a straight cut.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Good quality shag rug but color is decieving
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for the "teal" colored rug like in the photo DO NOT BE MISLED...it is more of a grey/blue than a teal. Rug is decent quality, however, the color is just off.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy315

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -fast shipping, -good grip (not slippery) Cons: -it's hard (it's not soft, not comfy to walk on), -it feels very synthetic when I touch it, -the smell right out of the plastic wrap was really strong!! (-the size was not what I expected but maybe I measured wrong so I'm not blaming anyone for this!) I was a little disapointted - 2positive points vs 3negative points led to the 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this rug, gray 5x7'3", because of the great price and decent reviews. When it arrived, it was nice, right color and everything I was expecting but it was not the correct size. Short about a half a foot each length and with wise. When I called Amazon they agreed to send a replacement. When it arrived, I opened it up, and it was exactly the same, short about a half a foot each. Disappointed to day the least!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Nice thick shag and color was true to image displayed!
customer_reviews.text: After ordering several rugs, I finally found the perfect one for my space. Not sure why it says Teal in the description and then states the color is Seafoam Green but it’s definitely not Teal nor does the pic on the description look Teal. I ordered based on the pic and it was correct. It’s a nice shag and fluffed up well. Can’t say anything about durability and ease of cleaning but I’m sure it will be fine. For the price, you can’t go wrong. Think I will order a spare for the future!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size (5x7') and feels great to walk on
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size (5x7') and feels great to walk on. Really wanted carpet in my room and this worked perfectly for such a good price. Could not find anything cheaper for quality and size.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Shag is LONG
customer_reviews.text: Just a heads up to buyers, the shag on this rug is LONG. I’ve never seen anything with it so long before lol. And although the other reviews here seem to go on about how soft this rug is I did not think it was very soft at all. It looked and felt like scratchy yarn to me. The color was nice though. I am grateful that returning it was incredibly easy.
customer_reviews.author: Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Girlfriend made me put in the basement
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the firetruck red one and she wasn't having it! On the quality of the product - it's okay. It's really that traditional 70's long shag rug. Now-a-days the style seems to have moved to a more soft plush shag. I have multiple ones like that and I also like them a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: The gray is a little light but still very nice and brightens up the space
customer_reviews.text: purchased the gray to replace another brand shag I had but the depth was too much for vacuuming and also looking flat. This rug is just right in depth for walking and cleaning and the price was a gem. The gray is a little light but still very nice and brightens up the space. Shipment was quick in a day maybe because I was one state over but still great. Can't go wrong on this quick accessory
customer_reviews.author: tech

customer_reviews.title: Service needs improvement but rug is fine
customer_reviews.text: Received the wrong one, but otherwise it’s okay. Ordered dark solid charcoal gray, but received a light gray with white diamond pattern. Don’t want to go through the hassle of exchanging, especially since it didn’t even come in a box (just wrapped in plastic). It’s shaggy and soft enough to be comfortable. Seems well made. The dogs like it and that’s all that counts.
customer_reviews.author: LOTR417

customer_reviews.title: Returned it
customer_reviews.text: This rug had a strong chemical smell and left residue on my feet, so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: but it's still a nice rug and feels nice under my feet
customer_reviews.text: The gray rug is a little darker than I expected, but it's still a nice rug and feels nice under my feet. I have a large living room with light vinyl wood floors and not much furniture, so this rug does a good job making it less empty. It came rolled up and the corners still seemed to want to curl up even after about 2 days. I suspect that it will probably fully settle after a while, but I went ahead and spent $10 for some non-curl corner devices, which got them under control.
customer_reviews.author: C R Shir

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good!
customer_reviews.text: The rug does meet my expectations but I will say the material isn't as nice as the photo. I shall try and upload some photos in the near future. For the price, I assumed it would have been a little more luxurious. That depends on ones taste. The rug feels good to walk on. I can relax w/o using house shoes/slippers as I have hardwood floors in my home. No kids, otherwise I'd suggest buying a rug with a different color or a cheaper price tag. Keep in mind that could mean bad material. This rug I gave Four Stars too because overall I am happy with the quality, size, and look.
customer_reviews.author: MinneapolisMark

customer_reviews.title: Really nice rug
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a dorm room and it's perfect for the space. It's soft and a great color gray. Couldn't ask for more for the price. And I looked at all the big super stores and none were as nice as this and were more money for a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: ontheriver

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful plush rug! Would reorder
customer_reviews.text: Rug is fantastic. Plush, GREAT quality. Grey is a little blue...like robins egg blue but only a slight look. However this worked for me because I have those colors in my living room. I'm giving it a very high rating because it feels great due to it being so plush and I do feel it is a high quality for the price that it is.
customer_reviews.author: Sedi

customer_reviews.title: SO PLUSH AND VIBRANT
customer_reviews.text: I had the smaller version of this and when I moved to a new house it just looked downright ridiculous because it was so small (4x6 I think) so I ordered a 6'7x9'3 and it's soooooooooo soft, softer than the other somehow. The dogs love it, and it fits the space well. I would definitely recommend this rug. Not sure why it won't let me post pictures but just imagine a fluffy dog with long hair and that's what it's like pushing your hands into this rug haha
customer_reviews.author: Maze Wright

customer_reviews.title: Gets frizzy
customer_reviews.text: Loved this rug! But after a year and a half it's getting harder to vacuum. The shag is getting more frayed or frizzy and stuff is getting caught in the rug and it's harder to vacuum out.
customer_reviews.author: Karisa B.

customer_reviews.title: Two deliveries- both wrong- in some way-- however--Value for price and quality/size-
customer_reviews.text: NOT AS PICTURED --First delivery-wrong size-square- not oval- true turquoise color- returned- second delivery, not true color- Blue not Turquoise-right oval size- I would return again- except- the task, elderly person with a broken shoulder had- of trying to re wrap in a plastic tub for safe ship- Very displeased- two orders- neither correct- However- the rug appears quality made- for price-I do not like this shade of blue- but livable-- Pictured below- rug on the left is a shade of blue-delivered today- right -is a true turquoise rug-- I had hope to match much closer:(((
customer_reviews.author: GrannyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfy, perfect rug!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was even better than what I was imagining! For $150 you really get your moneys worth and then some. It is extremely thick and fluffy! My cats love it and its super soft and comfy and easy to clean with my Dyson. I will be ordering more for sure! Only thing I did not like is it was prime and took longer than 2 days and customer service said it wasnt their fault even though it shipped later than expected and I had to take off work for a day to ensure it would be here (Since neighbors have greedy hands at Christmas time)
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: It has an amazing shag to it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this rug in red to go with my sons Spider-Man room theme. I had zero expectations for it and really only got it for color and just wanted something inexpensive because my son is 7 and rambunctious, this rug is incredible. It has an amazing shag to it. It Feels high quality and is so soft and thick. This is the best shag rug I have purchased and I just purchased one for several hundred dollars. This rug exceeded my expectations and then surprised me again! Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: des

customer_reviews.title: Thick and nice, but not for high traffic area.
customer_reviews.text: It's very thick, which is nice if that's what you're looking for..and has a nice rough bottom..no shedding. However, being white it would show footprints in time in a high traffic area, as this material absorbs oils from bare feet. If using it in a less walked over area would be nice. Don't like the unfinished feeling of the ends.
customer_reviews.author: K.S.

customer_reviews.title: High quality and bold color!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this rug!!! It took me a long time to get my room ready to use if. I have brown carpet that is the color of a paper bag (yuck) and I wanted to really liven the room. This did it! It is so thick - the shag is high quality. It isn't a poorly made rug - it's far better than my carpet! It stays fluffy, it vacuums well and I love this color. It's turquoise so if that's what you want, it's that bold! It made my whole living room feel attractive and inviting.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L. Chieco

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rug for kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our son's play room about two years ago. It has held up extremely well! We now have it in his bedroom. It's a bit scratchy and not super plush but it's great for kids. It's easy to vacuum and fluffs back up nicely. The color is nice and bright. Overall it's been a great purchase and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great price and a beautiful color!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, this orange is popping in my bathroom. I already had an orange shower curtain that should have been red but when I received it, it was orange but that's okay because with the orange and white shower curtain along with this orange rug, I don't know what to say but I just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value - Great Quality SUPER SOFT
customer_reviews.text: Wow! So much nicer than anticipated. Thicker than expected, still buy a rug pad, but i do not put a rug down without a pad. Soft, exact size and color is lovely. I actually ordered a 2nd rug to put on the other side of the bed, floors are very cold on winter here in Chicago so everyone gets a comfy warm place to plant their feet!
customer_reviews.author: Michelerp

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Size
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and great quality but they shipped me the wrong size. I ordered two rugs and one is wider than the other by about three inches. I ordered the same size rug so the shorter rug must be defective or something. The rugs look uneven and I might have to roll it back up and return it. I will right another review after I make a return and receive a different rug. I honestly might just order a circle rug instead so I don't run into the same uneven rug issue again.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: I cant speak for the quality but the price was great and so were the reviews
customer_reviews.text: Had to return because the color I received was nowhere near the color pictured. The turquoise wound up being a more neon-light blue. Something that belongs in a childrens room. I cant speak for the quality but the price was great and so were the reviews. If you aren't as worried about the color matching exactly, I would say go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Britt Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Nice rug, too bad it was disgusting and moldy
customer_reviews.text: Rug arrived in damp plastic bag, stunk to high heaven and had moldy spots all on one end. Customer service barely helped, sending a replacement scheduled to take a week, ( It was a prime item) and made me ship (for free, I’ll concede) the disgusting article back (its 8x10) without a cent back for my trouble. The rug itself seems nice, we’ll see what I think of I can get a mold free version
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: For the WIN!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this rug for my infant son's room. Was shocked at how soft it was for the price! we did by a rug pad to go under it, because i have cement floors. The rug itself is so soft and he plays on it, we lay on it, my entire family lays on it! I wish i would have purchased the larger one, only because now that he is getting older, I am fearful of him jumping out of his crib. There is about 6" from the crib to the rug. I will purcahse the EXACT same one in the larger size and put this in my older son;t room.
customer_reviews.author: karab

customer_reviews.title: Good quality rug for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got the big one. It's not super thick but it's thicker than I thought it would be for the price. The kids jumped on the floor immediately. Pretty great rug. True to size too. I got the deep chocolate brown. It was deep brown like I wanted. I'd definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: theirmom

customer_reviews.title: Nice rug- but a little dissapointed in the shade/color
customer_reviews.text: This rug is nice- it is soft but not as soft as some have posted. I definitely recommend buying a pad for underneath. It vacummned nicely after I unrolled it. I think my biggest disappointment is the color. I ordered the gray and it definitely has a bluish tone to it. My furniture is a true gray and I was hoping it would match a little better. I don’t like leaving reviews less than 5 stars- but I am a little disappointed in the shade of gray- but maybe I don’t know my colors so well. Other than that, the rug is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Great rug!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't seen it shed yet and no smell. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Size is off!
customer_reviews.text: Would deserve 4 stars ---- if the size was right. Mine is only 55 inches long, not 60 as mentioned. Because I needed exactly 60 inches in front of my L-shaped couch I now have a 5 inch gap. There is no excuse for a machine made carpet to be off sized. Color orange is as expected, feels nice and "fluffy", stays put -- but the size is disturbing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I would rate it 4.5
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this rug. I bought it in brown and the color is just as the picture. I thought it would have a rubber backing but it's actually sturdy jute, which is great. The brown pile layer materual looks like a very thick yarn-like material rather than the messy fibrous, teddy-bear-like material. (My pictures show the rug under normal daylight and flashlight).
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: I love my sweet home cozy shag!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got my order today and fluff it up with my foot and wala, turns out so perfect. I love it and so soft! I will be ordering the runner as well to match with it. After reading the reviews about the smell - it’s really not bad. It’s smells new to me. I highly recommend this product! Cream color is just so beautiful. This carpet is so cozy. I don’t even feel like putting my furniture on it. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Keston

customer_reviews.title: Cleans very easy
customer_reviews.text: I love the color. But I’m mostly writing this review to say how easy it is to clean. My German Shepard left me several large brown surprises on it....the liquid kind.... and I thought they wouldn’t come out but all of it did. With just hot water and dish soap! I’m very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Erica B.

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything except it slides on my flooring. I placed a couple small sheets of nonslip shelf liner & it doesn’t move now. Was careful first time I used the vacuum but no problem at all. Not one snag or pull. Very plush & so soft! My dog has claimed it as hers though 😍 Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Much lighter than online.
customer_reviews.text: It's is much MUCH lighter than it shows online. I would have preferred it darker. However, I didn't return it because it is very soft and lush and is still in the same color family that goes with my room. If you want a soft rug this is it but just know the color is off. See gray cat for comparison. ;)
customer_reviews.author: turd_ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Rug is great, but...
customer_reviews.text: Rug is great but the dimensions are incorrectly posted for the 3x5 rug. Ad says 39" x 60", actual of what I received was 39" x 55". It just barely does what I ordered it for but even a half inch shorter and it wouldn't have. Wish sellers would take time to list products properly.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color sent and product feels like cheap carpet.
customer_reviews.text: Imagined product to be very soft as described by many. Very excited to see the product just to find that I ordered charcoal gray and they sent me a light gray color. Didn’t open the package but felt the product and it’s rough and everything like a cheap carpet. Returning, very disappointed that it’s not the quality I wanted and wasted my time sending the wrong color.
customer_reviews.author: sanman129

customer_reviews.title: Great Rug, great price, happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the Sweet Homes Stores Cozy Shag Rug collection and plan to order another one for my bedroom. I’ve had it in my bathroom for several weeks now, no shedding or compression matting. Soft and dense. Minor to almost zero curling for first couple of days, now laying flat and no rug pad used. It is used on stone tile, no slipping, but then I got the long runner since I have a long rectangular bath room, (see photo) nice heavy weight, grey color is very pretty and accurate to color pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Bren.G

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to receiving this rug after reading all the great reviews. However, I was quite disappointed with the rug. I thought it wasnt nearly as soft as another shag rug I have (Safavieh brand) and there were multiple spots in the backing where the rug fibers have been pulled through so it’s not the best quality either. We rolled it out to immediately roll it back up to begin the return process. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: S. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Love this rug!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a deal! Wasn't sure because I thought this can't be any good at such a great price. I thankfully listened to the reviews and made the purchase. Looks great, feels amazing and it's easy to clean/vacuum. No issues with unpacking: opened the box, cut off the plastic and unrolled! Filled right out with a vacuum, no funny smell and laid perfectly flat. Awesome purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Buglet

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice rug i docked stars for the color i git ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice rug i docked stars for the color i git was charcoal and not teal. The sticker on the rug packaging was teal. Its clearly a datk gray. I didnt send it back because i have a gray theme to the room.i just wanted the teal to brighten up my dark couches. Good price for the size and it does make the den more cozy especially with our cold tile floors.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised. Will buy more at this price!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a temporary / disposable rug to use while I continued looking for exactly what I wanted. I'm pleasantly surprised with the quality & comfort of this rug for the price and free shipping (LOVE AmazonPrime). :) I'm no longer looking for the replacement as I will buy another one of these when that time comes, especially since I like to change the looks/colors frequently. Great deal & far better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen C

customer_reviews.title: Better than my expectation
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about purchasing a rug without feeling/seeing it in person, but I'm glad I did! It's so soft and thicker than I thought. You have to rub against the direction of the shag when you first unroll it. I also had to place heavy items on the corners to keep them down, let them stay overnight, and the sides have stayed down ever since. I'm considering purchasing another for my bedroom or dining room. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: muzik_hippie

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate description
customer_reviews.text: The 20 x 59 inch rug the I ordered is actually 24 x 59 inches. I needed it to fit between my bed and the wall which has a 20 inch max width. I can probably use it somewhere else so I’ll keep it but I won’t be buying from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it!!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about buying a rug off amazon and not being able to see it in person but I’m glad I did cause for the price you can’t beat it! I’ve vacuumed over it a couple dozen times already & it has not shed one bit, it is holding up like it’s the first day I got it, it is shaggy and soft and exactly as described. If you’re on the fence-just do it! You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect multipurpose option for space that doesn't need a high priced rug
customer_reviews.text: For the price, we love this little rug. Put it in our nursery and it looks great. Soft and thick enough for our need. Make sure to measure out the size of the rug in the place you want to place it in your house so you get an idea of how it will fit. If anything, the rug we bought is a little small for our space, but that's more user error than anything. The size of this rug is pretty much spot on with what it was listed at.
customer_reviews.author: TheGreatBambino

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: As far as the quality and feel of this rug, it’s great. But as for the color, it’s not navy blue. It’s lighter than navy and does not appear as dark as it does in the pictures. Unfortunately I did not want to deal with repackaging and shipping it to return it, so I’m keeping it. It still goes with my decor, just not near as dark as I was hoping it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Megan S-N

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the 5x7 for my sons’ small bedroom. Quite impressed with the quality for the price. The rug is soft and doesn’t feel plastic or stiff. It hasn’t shed much and seems like it will be easy to clean. I took one star off because the navy isn’t as dark as I expected. I would classify it as between a true navy and a royal blue. It still works in their room, but it’s definitely lighter than their curtains, which are a true, dark navy.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy M

customer_reviews.title: Quality great, color meh...
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a great quality rug. Shag is not too high, not too skimpy, just a nice plushy soft. Size was exactly as described. No bad chemical smell. Only caveat is: as someone else posted, I ordered the teal and it is more of a green tinged gray. Not horrible but definitely not the pretty teal I was wanting. I'm keeping it because of the quality, but beware of the teal color, it looks nothing like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Mooebn

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this rug. It looks beautiful with our grey and tan shaded floor tiling and black leather furniture. We have Sherwin Williams 'sea salt' walls and this shade of grey is really really nice with that color. It really pulled our open-concept living room space together in our new home, would definitely get this again.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Eidukas

customer_reviews.title: Great, economical rug
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 5x7 turquoise rug. I'd say it looks more blue than turquoise, but we don't have great lighting in the room where we are using it. Fluffs up in a few days and the odor goes away too (see photos). It isnt as soft as the rug we had before, but that one was much more expensive per square foot. Overall not a bad deal.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft thick heavy rug love it!!! I didn’t realize how small it would be but that’s my fault should have got the 5x7. But love it and bought for my sons room . Color pretty true. Got my other son a baby one for under his crib too!!!! Does not shed. Gray for kids room or any room you want a soft rug.
customer_reviews.author: dditmars

customer_reviews.title: Love the "shagg-ness"
customer_reviews.text: Great looking rug. I bought this with the intention to place it next to my bed so I feel the shagg-ness of it every morning and its awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Rugs!
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of my best finds this year! I searched for weeks for the perfect shag rugs for my kids rooms but wasn't having luck at local retail or furniture stores. I started searching online and after reading review after review I decided to order two of these beauties in grey! They are huge, extremely soft, they do not leave fuzz anywhere, & SO affordable! I am planning on getting one for my room soon too! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells
customer_reviews.text: Nice rug but smells. Our first rug seemed to have some smelly oily residue that would come off on our hands. The rug stank out the apartment and the smell even leached into the underlay and ruined it -- terrible. Got a replacement via Amazon customer support. It still had the smell but it wasn't nearly as bad, so we kept it and let it air out. Aside from that, it's a nice rug.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious rug at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a deal! Seriously if you would buy a rug like this anywhere else, even a discount realtor like TJ Maxx, it would set you back well over $100. This rug looks really nice and clean and has a decent thickness to it. For the size you recieve, it's a super affordable deal and it looks luxurious. It was easy to vacume over this rug and the only thing I needed to buy was a non slip backing to the rug since I have hardwood floors. This is a "shag type" rug so keep that in mind when purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: anthony p

product_meta.title: Sweet Home Stores Sweet Home Bedroom shag Rugs, 7'10" x 9'10", Gray
product_meta.description: Color:Gray| Size:7'10" x 9'10"Cozy Shag Collection features a simple yet sophisticated fusion of traditional Moroccan trellis motif or solid design and contemporary shag construction for a neat look that elegantly accents most furnishing and floors with easy-to-design styling. Machine-made with premium quality, the jute backing and soft polypropylene pile offers wear, stain and fade resistance, which makes this rug serviceable for long years to come on a wide range of floors as a luxurious, modern and trendy update including heavy traffic areas like living room, dining room, teens room, guest room, nursery room, TV room, kids room, entrance, dorm room, bedroom, family room, staircase, foyer, entryways and hallways. It protects your floors as well as acting as a noise damper. The soft anti-stain and shed-free pile offers a fresh and cozy feeling and easy maintenance as well as providing a safe and comfortable space for your kids, guests and pets. Available in a rich assortment of sizes, shapes and colors, this family-friendly area rug is also a great way to re-do a room without breaking the bank and an ideal gift for holidays and birthdays. If you are looking for a comfortable and relaxing environment for your morning coffee, evening dinner or happy hours in your home or office, this shaggy rug is what you need. Update any space in your home instantly and effortlessly when you roll out this stylish rug.
feature_bullets: This easy to design beautiful solid-grey shag rug is available in a vareity of sizes to suit and update any room or furniture in your house
Embellish your floors with the advantage of this shag rug's neutral-colored solid-design that harmoniously blend with most floors and furniture.
Lavishly textured soft and plush pile gently caresses your bare feet. Create a comfy landing spot next to your bed or by your home bar with this beautiful Turkish rug.
Warm up your reading corner with this attractive contemporary rug that warms a cool night like a snuggling furry friend.
Machine-made in Turkey with the hightest quality polypropylene in the pile and with durable jute in the backing for longevity.Spot clean, vacuum regularly
Offering a tender touch to your feet after your busy day, the high-pile also acts as a noise damper
Sturdy jute backing protects your floors and makes this rug serviceable for long years to come
Non-shedding and stain resistant pile offers carefree maintenance and safety for kids and pets
This budget-friendly yet luxurious-looking rug is a great gift for holidays or birthdays to spoil yourself or cherish others without spending a fortune
Have peace of mind by trusting our amazing customer service which offers hassle-free returns if you're not totally happy with this rug

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars3,230 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
